text: Galijula is an uninhabited isle in the southwestern Adriatic Sea, 3 nautical miles from the island of Palagruža. It belongs to the municipality of Komiža in Split-Dalmatia County, Croatia. It is the southernmost point of Croatia. ==References== Category:Islands of the Adriatic Sea Category:Uninhabited islands of Croatia Category:Landforms of Split-Dalmatia County
title: Galijula
